Name: Passport to Pigmote Isle
Description: An imperious guinea pig sits at a small desk. "Passport!" it demands. "Or a bit of paper, if that's easier. His Highness insists I stamp something. It makes everything Proper. And Official."

DefaultEvent.Name: The Return to Pigmote Isle
DefaultEvent.Description: The guinea pig proudly marks your paper with a stamp carved out of a mushroom. "Welcome to Cavia," it declares, saluting. "Enjoy your stay."

ChildBranches.Name: Find something for it to stamp

DefaultEvent.Name: The Return to Pigmote Isle
DefaultEvent.Description: The guinea pig proudly marks your paper with a stamp carved out of a mushroom. "Welcome to Cavia," it declares, saluting. "Enjoy your stay."

ChildBranches.Name: Find something for it to stamp
ChildBranches.Description: A piece of paper should do.

DefaultEvent.Name: Persona non grata
DefaultEvent.Description:
The guinea pig reaches down to stamp your paper. It looks up. Its whiskers quiver as it looks properly at your face. It screams, a high-pitched howl that soon summons the House of Cavy's Knights to escort you right back to the ship.

That'll be a 'no', then...

ChildBranches.Name: A quiet return
ChildBranches.Description: Hopefully they have forgotten what happened last time.
